Class BarChartManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.navis.framework.presentation.charting.jfree.JFreeChartManager<org.jfree.chart.plot.CategoryPlot,ChartDataConverter.MyDefaultCategoryDataset>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IJFreeChartManager<org.jfree.chart.plot.CategoryPlot,ChartDataConverter.MyDefaultCategoryDataset>, IAdapterChartManager<org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart>

    public class BarChartManager
extends JFreeChartManager<org.jfree.chart.plot.CategoryPlot,ChartDataConverter.MyDefaultCategoryDataset>
    This class creates and updates the JFreeChart chart generation of bar charts.
    Author:
    Gisella Saavedra, Oct 22, 2010
